title: Generate ASO reports from Google Play Apps with Gemini AI & Google Docs
description:
# Automated App Analysis & ASO Report Generator

This workflow automates the process of analyzing a mobile app from the Google Play Store and generating a professional **ASO (App Store Optimization) Report**.  
Simply submit a Play Store URL, and the workflow will fetch app intelligence data, parse it, run an AI-based analysis, and deliver a formatted report in Google Docs. A Telegram notification with the document link ensures you never miss a new report.


## ‚ú® Key Features
- **Form Input Trigger** ‚Äì Start the workflow by submitting a Play Store URL.  
- **Automated Data Retrieval** ‚Äì Uses HTTP request to fetch app intelligence (via SensorTower or similar APIs).  
- **Smart Data Parsing** ‚Äì Extracts essential app details, competitor insights, reviews, downloads, and revenue data.  
- **AI-Powered ASO Report** ‚Äì Generates a professional analysis using LLM (Gemini via OpenRouter) with structured sections:  
  - üì± App Overview  
  - ‚≠ê User Ratings & Reviews  
  - üìä Competitor Analysis  
  - üìà Market Insights  
  - üí° Actionable Recommendations  
- **Google Docs Integration** ‚Äì Creates and updates a Google Doc with the generated report.  
- **Instant Notification** ‚Äì Sends a Telegram message with the app report link for quick access.  

---

## üîê Required Credentials
To run this workflow, you‚Äôll need:
- **SensorTower API (or alternative App Intelligence API)** ‚Äì for app details, reviews, competitors, and market data.  
- **OpenRouter API** ‚Äì to access LLM model.  
- **Google Docs OAuth2** ‚Äì to create and update the ASO report in Google Docs.  
- **Telegram API** ‚Äì for instant notifications with the report link.  

---

## üéÅ Benefits
- **Save Time** ‚Äì Automates the manual process of app research and reporting.  
- **Consistent Reporting** ‚Äì Ensures every report follows a professional structure with clear sections.  
- **Actionable Insights** ‚Äì Get AI-generated recommendations to improve app performance and competitiveness.  
- **Collaboration-Ready** ‚Äì Reports are stored in Google Docs for easy sharing and editing.  
- **Real-Time Alerts** ‚Äì Stay updated via Telegram whenever a new report is generated.  

---
disclaimer: This workflow is provided as-is. Please review and test before using in production.
